articles.title: TSMC says tariffs have some impact but AI demand robust
articles.content: U.S. tariffs are having some impact but demand for artificial intelligence remains strong and continues to outpace supply, the chief executive of Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC said on Tuesday. ...

articles.title: S&P 500's breakout May was largely a result of Mag 7 gains
articles.content: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) clocked its best month of trading in May since 1990, and the majority of the Magnificent Seven — comprised of tech stocks Meta Platforms (META), Microsoft (MSFT), Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Nvidia (NVDA), Tesla (TSLA) — may be deserving of some of the credit. Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman recaps the Mag 7 stock gains and how it contributed to the S&P 500's breakout May. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

articles.title: The Magnificent Seven Stocks Staged a Blistering May Rally. What's Next?

articles.title: Apple challenges 'unreasonable' EU order to open up to rivals
articles.content: Apple has submitted a legal challenge to an EU order to open up its closed ecosystem to rivals such as Meta and Alphabet's Google, saying the demands are unreasonable and hamper innovation.  The European Commission had in March detailed how Apple must comply with the Digital Markets Act, which aims to rein in the power of Big Tech.  Apple said the EU's interoperability requirements create "a process that is unreasonable, costly, and stifles innovation".
